statusLine.command: input=$(cat 2>/dev/null || echo '{}'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | grep -o '"current_dir"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"[^"]*"' 2>/dev/null | sed 's/.*"current_dir"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/' | head -1); [ -z "$cwd" ] && cwd="$PWD"; [ ! -d "$cwd" ] && cwd="$PWD"; model_section=$(echo "$input" | sed -n '/"model"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*{/,/}/p' 2>/dev/null); model=$(echo "$model_section" | grep -o '"display_name"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"[^"]*"' 2>/dev/null | sed 's/.*"display_name"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/' | head -1); [ -z "$model" ] && model=$(echo "$input" | grep -o '"display_name"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"[^"]*"' 2>/dev/null | sed 's/.*"display_name"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/' | head -1); [ -z "$model" ] || [ "$model" = "null" ] && model="Claude"; model=$(echo "$model" | sed -E 's/^Claude[[:space:]]+//'); time=$(date '+%I:%M %p' 2>/dev/null || echo '??:??'); git_info=""; if cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); [ -z "$branch" ] && branch="detached"; uncommitted=""; git --no-optional-locks status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | head -1 | grep -q '.' && uncommitted="●"; main_branch=$(git --no-optional-locks symbolic-ref refs/remotes/origin/HEAD 2>/dev/null | sed 's@^refs/remotes/origin/@@'); [ -z "$main_branch" ] && main_branch="main"; ahead=""; if [ "$branch" != "detached" ] && [ "$branch" != "$main_branch" ]; then ahead_count=$(git --no-optional-locks rev-list --count "${main_branch}..${branch}" 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$ahead_count" ] && [ "$ahead_count" -gt 0 ] && ahead="↑$ahead_count"; fi; conflict=""; git_dir=$(git --no-optional-locks rev-parse --git-dir 2>/dev/null); [ -d "${git_dir}/rebase-merge" ] || [ -d "${git_dir}/rebase-apply" ] && conflict="⚠"; git --no-optional-locks ls-files -u 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^' && conflict="⚠"; git_parts="$branch"; [ -n "$uncommitted" ] && git_parts="$git_parts $uncommitted"; [ -n "$ahead" ] && git_parts="$git_parts $ahead"; [ -n "$conflict" ] && git_parts="$git_parts $conflict"; git_info="($git_parts)"; fi; port_info=""; [ -n "$PORT" ] && port_info="PORT:$PORT"; if [ -n "$git_info" ] && [ -n "$port_info" ]; then printf "\033[96m%s\033[0m | \033[91m%s\033[0m | \033[33m%s\033[0m | \033[34m%s\033[0m" "$time" "$git_info" "$port_info" "$model"; elif [ -n "$git_info" ]; then printf "\033[96m%s\033[0m | \033[91m%s\033[0m | \033[34m%s\033[0m" "$time" "$git_info" "$model"; elif [ -n "$port_info" ]; then printf "\033[96m%s\033[0m | \033[33m%s\033[0m | \033[34m%s\033[0m" "$time" "$port_info" "$model"; else printf "\033[96m%s\033[0m | \033[34m%s\033[0m" "$time" "$model"; fi
